name: ChemistryLaTeX
description: Renders chemical structures and formulas. Supports mhchem, chemfig, SMILES, and molecule names. Server-based rendering via ChemistryLaTeX Server.

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self'; default-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://server-chemistryrenderer.vercel.app https://www.ebi.ac.uk https://*.ebi.ac.uk https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov https://3Dmol.org https://www.crystallography.net https://files.rcsb.org https://cdn.rcsb.org https://models.rcsb.org https://molstar.org; frame-src https://embed.molview.org https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov https://molstar.org
